Observation: Implementation of the Strategic Plan Government has been implementing the NDP II, which end at the end of financial year 2019/2020. In line with the NDP, Kalangala district administration developed and had its strategic plan approved for the period 2015-2020, this plan set out both the long term and short term targets to be achieved. current audit year was the last year of implementation of the strategic plan, and it is anticipated that all the projected targets would have been accomplished. noted that at the time of audit (June 2019/20), out of 21 strategic targets, the district had fully achieved five (05) targets, partially attained three (03) targets, while thirteen (13) targets were not attained at all, as shown in the table below; details in Appendix i; The extent of achievement of 2015/16-2019/2020 strategic plan by 2019/2020 SN. Level of performance by the end of 2019/2020 I 1 2 3 Fully implemented Not implemented Partially implemented Grand Total Source: OAG analysis No of strategic goals/ objectives 5 13 3 21 % of total number of strategic objective s 24% 62% 14% 100% The
Recommendation: advised the Accounting Officer to roll over the incomplete and un- implemented projects to the next development plan. I
